header: 英语语法基础练习题（一）

questions.question: I often ______ TV in the evening.
Please stand up and ______ the word.
He and I ______ teacher and student.
Students often ______ to school in the morning.
______ Tom's class start at eight?
questions.cn: 汤姆的课是八点开始吗?

questions.question: I have to ______ that book today.
______ time do you usually go to bed?
He works ______ the farm every day.
I usually read some books ______ Monday.
questions.cn: 我通常星期一读一些书。

questions.question: ______ is the first day of the week.
questions.cn: 星期天是一星期的第一天。

questions.question: There are ______ students in the classroom.
______ here last week?
questions.cn: 他们上个星期在这里吗?

questions.question: ______ the two skirts last night?
questions.cn: 昨天晚上她把这两条裙子烧毁了吗?

questions.question: He went to the zoo ______ yesterday.
questions.cn: 他昨天是搭乘公车去的动物园。

questions.question: He ______ many an animal there.
questions.cn: 他在那里看到了很多动物。

questions.question: There are ______ animals in the park.
I don't have the key ______ the door.
Their wives ______ to one another.
questions.cn: 他们的太太正在交谈着。

questions.question: I am able to ______ the work.
Will he ______ to the zoo tomorrow?
Your car is new, but ______ old.
questions.cn: 你们的车子是新的,但我们的车子是旧的。

questions.question: I ______ your brother's cold.
questions.cn: 我被你哥哥传染感冒了。

questions.question: ______ is very cold in winter there.
We have a lot of ______ today.
I brought ______ some clothes.
questions.cn: 我拿了一点衣服来给他。

header: 英语语法基础练习题（二）

questions.question: One of the students ______ football.
questions.cn: 学生中有一位在踢足球。

questions.question: These clothes cost a lot of ______.
questions.cn: 这些衣服要花费许多钱。

questions.question: Each of us ______ to play football.
questions.cn: 我们中的每一位都喜欢踢足球。

questions.question: She is ______ girl in our class.
questions.cn: 她是我们班里最高的女孩。

questions.question: He used ______ chemicals on his fruit.
questions.cn: 他的水果没有使用农药。

questions.question: The food tastes ______.
questions.cn: 这食物尝起来味道不错。

questions.question: He looks as if he ______ sick.
He compares his plan ______ mine.
questions.cn: 他将他的计画同我的比较。

questions.question: One-fifth of the pupils ______ to universities.
questions.cn: 五分之一的学生上大学。

questions.question: I bought five ______ stamps.
questions.cn: 我买了五张两元的邮票。

questions.question: I have a ______ boy.
questions.cn: 我有一个四岁大的男孩。

questions.question: ______ lives abroad.
questions.cn: 我的一个亲属住在国外。

questions.question: ______ time is it by your watch?
He goes to school ______ every day.

header: 英语语法基础练习题（三）

questions.question: Tom's mother is busy ______ in the kitchen.
questions.cn: 汤姆的母亲忙着在厨房里做饭。

questions.question: John's parents lived in America ______.
questions.cn: 约翰的双亲去年住在美国。

questions.question: There ______ two glasses on the table.
______ are no tables in the room.
Mr. Lin is these ______ teacher.
questions.cn: 林先生是这些学生的老师。

questions.question: Tom ______ to your brother.
questions.cn: 汤姆正在跟你的兄弟谈话。

questions.question: Tom is ______, isn't he?
questions.cn: 汤姆是你的学生,不是吗?

questions.question: There ______ two clocks on the wall.
I get up at six ______ morning.
There are two ______ living in this house.
questions.cn: 这房子内住有两户家庭。

questions.question: She usually ______ clothes in the evening.
______ son is a junior high school student.
questions.cn: 他们的儿子是一位国中生。

questions.question: The boys are talking about ______ brother.
questions.cn: 这些男孩正在议论他的兄弟。

questions.question: I asked him ______ basketball with us.
questions.cn: 我要求他跟我们一起打篮球。

questions.question: He can't speak English, ______ I can.
We need some ______ for the bus.
They will ______ Taipei on January 26.
questions.cn: 他们在一月二十六日将去台北。

questions.question: They ______ together this evening.
questions.cn: 他们今晚想要一起读书。

questions.question: The first season of the year is ______.
questions.cn: 一年的第一个季节是春天。

questions.question: The map ______ on the wall before.
questions.cn: 这张地图从前是挂在墙上的。

questions.question: She washed the rice and ______ lunch.
We felt the bus ______.
questions.cn: 我们感觉到巴士在移动。

questions.question: The day ______ Wednesday is Thursday.
questions.cn: 在星期三之后的那一天是星期四。

questions.question: There is ______ clock on the wall.
______ on the table is very nice.
My brother is ______ boy.
questions.cn: 我的哥哥是一个非常高的男孩。

questions.question: Look! Tom and Jerry ______.
questions.cn: 看!汤姆和杰瑞正在玩耍。

header: 英语语法基础练习题（四）

questions.question: My mother usually ______ at five.
questions.cn: 我母亲通常在五点钟起床。

questions.question: Spring is ______ season of the year.
questions.cn: 春天是一年中的第一个季节。

questions.question: The class ______ having a discussion.
questions.cn: 这个班正在进行一场讨论。

questions.question: She is ______ English teacher.
questions.cn: 她是一位非常好的英文教师。

questions.question: There ______ some apples on the table.
The students are running ______ the theater.
Does ______ begin at eight?
questions.cn: 第二节课是在八点钟开始吗?

questions.question: My little sister is only ______.
questions.cn: 我的小妹妹只有一岁大。

questions.question: Summer is ______ before fall.
questions.cn: 夏季是秋季之前的那个季节。

questions.question: Two of these apples ______ mine.
questions.cn: 这些苹果中有两个是我的。

questions.question: Study hard, ______ you'll pass the exam.
questions.cn: 用功读书,你就会考试及格。

questions.question: ______ he said made us interested.
questions.cn: 他说的话使我们感兴趣。

questions.question: ______ a lovely child he is!
questions.cn: 他是一个多可爱的孩子啊!

questions.question: We ______ walk home every afternoon.
questions.cn: 我们俩每天下午都步行回家。

questions.question: ______ do you go to school every day?
______ classes are Math and English.
questions.cn: 前两节课是数学和英文。

questions.question: Every student has ______ book.
questions.cn: 每个学生都有他自己的书。

questions.question: The windows of the room ______ open.
questions.cn: 这房间的窗子是开着的。

questions.question: Monday is the second day ______ the week.
questions.cn: 星期一是一周中的第二天。

questions.question: May is ______ girl in my family.
______ the class doing their homework?
questions.cn: 班里的学生们在做家庭作业吗?

questions.question: He made ______ mistakes in his homework.
questions.cn: 他的家庭作业里几乎没有错误。

questions.question: There are ______ on sale.
questions.cn: 有各种各样的鱼降价出售。
options: D. all kinds of the fish

questions.question: I often go to school with ______.
questions.cn: 我经常和你一起去上学。

questions.question: He ______.
options: D. lent to it to me

questions.question: Hurry up, ______ you'll be late.
questions.cn: 快点! 否则你会迟到的。

questions.question: Can you tell me ______?
questions.cn: 你能告诉我他的意思吗?

questions.question: There is an apple on the table, ______?
questions.cn: 桌上有一个苹果,不是吗?

header: 英语语法基础练习题（五）

questions.question: I saw him ______ a bicycle yesterday.
questions.cn: 昨天我看见他偷了一辆脚踏车。

questions.question: Do you know ______?
questions.cn: 你知道他什么时候到吗?

questions.question: Let's see where we are, ______?
questions.cn: 让我们看看我们在什么地方,可以吗?

questions.question: I wish you ______ him yesterday.
questions.cn: 我希望昨天你给他打过电话。

questions.question: ______ will cost him five dollars.
questions.cn: 两本书的每一本都将花费他五美元。

questions.question: Canada is even ______ than America.
questions.cn: 加拿大甚至比美国还要大。

questions.question: He's never learned Spanish, ______?
questions.cn: 他从没学过西班牙语,是不是?

questions.question: Either you or I ______ wrong.
questions.cn: 不是你错了就是我错了。

questions.question: She is a ______.
questions.cn: 她是个美丽而年轻的女孩。

questions.question: It ______ this way.
questions.cn: 它只能用这种方法完成。
options: C. is had to be done

questions.question: Let's go out for dinner, ______?
questions.cn: 咱们到外面去吃晚饭吧,好吗?

questions.question: ______ fluently he speaks English!
questions.cn: 他的英文讲得多流利啊!

questions.question: What a clever boy ______!
questions.cn: 他是一个多么聪明的男孩啊!

questions.question: Either of the trains ______ to London.
questions.cn: 两列火车中有一列开往伦敦。

questions.question: ______ good news we've got!
questions.cn: 我们得到的消息太好了!

questions.question: Everybody has done ______ homework.
questions.cn: 每个人都做了家庭作业。

questions.question: John had ______ furniture for his room.
questions.cn: 约翰有足够的家具用来布置他的房间。

questions.question: My father is ______ the living room.
There are two ______ on the table.

header: 英语语法基础练习题（六）

questions.question: ______ father is sitting on a bench.
questions.cn: 玛丽的父亲正坐在长凳上。

questions.question: A week begins ______ Sunday.
questions.cn: 星期日是一星期的开始。

questions.question: Saturday and Sunday are the ______.
questions.cn: 星期六和星期日是周末。

questions.question: Many people catch a cold in ______.
How do you ______ today, Helen?
questions.cn: 海伦,你今天觉得身体如何?

questions.question: It ______ like a cookie.
questions.cn: 它尝起来像一个小点心。

questions.question: One of the girls ______ Mary.
questions.cn: 其中的一个女孩是玛丽。

questions.question: Why not ______ her some fruit?
questions.cn: 为什么不给她买些水果?

questions.question: I'll have the room ______.
questions.cn: 我将叫人把房间收拾干净。

questions.question: ______ pen on the table is very good.
The windows in the room are ______.
questions.cn: 房间里的窗户现在都开着呢。

questions.question: Mr. Li is these ______ father.
questions.cn: 李先生是这些男孩的父亲。

questions.question: It is very cold ______ winter here.
Father, is ______ in the kitchen?
questions.cn: 爸爸,妈妈在厨房里面吗?

questions.question: ______ car is white.
questions.cn: 汤姆和约翰的车是白色的。

questions.question: Mary is ______ only girl in her class.
questions.cn: 玛丽是班里唯一的女孩。

questions.question: Was Helen ______ girl?
questions.cn: 海伦是一个很高的女孩吗?

header: 英语语法基础练习题（七）

questions.question: ______ cars are blue.
questions.cn: 约翰和玛丽两人的车都是蓝色的。

questions.question: ______ daughter is a high school teacher.
questions.cn: 他们的女儿是一名中学教师。

questions.question: You will have ______ there tomorrow.
questions.cn: 你们明天在那里将玩得愉快。

questions.question: They ______ enough clothes in fall.
questions.cn: 在秋天他们穿足够的衣服。

questions.question: May I ______ David, please?
questions.cn: 我可以请大卫听电话吗?

questions.question: There ______ two pictures on the wall.
Which do you like ______, coffee or tea?
questions.cn: 咖啡和茶你比较喜欢哪种?

questions.question: There isn't ______ food in the kitchen.
They will be back ______ a week.
questions.cn: 他们将在一星期后回来。

questions.question: The sun ______ rises in the morning.
The story sounds ______.
questions.cn: 这个故事听起来是真实的。

questions.question: His family ______ a large one.
questions.cn: 他的家庭是一个大家庭。

questions.question: He was ______ in 1649.
questions.cn: 他于一六四九年被绞死。

questions.question: He is my ______ novelist.
questions.cn: 他是我最喜欢的小说家。

questions.question: Everybody must have ______ own choice.
questions.cn: 每一个人都必须有他自己的选择。

questions.question: My father often ______ after supper.
questions.cn: 我父亲晚饭后经常散步。

questions.question: We ______ last night.
questions.cn: 昨天晚上我们玩得非常开心。

header: 英语语法基础练习题（八）

questions.question: Did you come here ______?
questions.cn: 你是乘公车来这里的吗?

questions.question: Mary is ______ the window, not the door.
questions.cn: 玛丽正在关窗户,不是关门。

questions.question: We are ______ and writing the word.
questions.cn: 我们正在拼读书写这个字。

questions.question: There ______ a television near the sofa.
questions.cn: 沙发附近有一台电视机。

questions.question: ______ there two pictures on the wall?
My mother is a good ______.
questions.cn: 我的妈妈是一个好厨师。

questions.question: She usually ______ lunch at twelve-thirty.
questions.cn: 她通常十二点三十分吃午饭。

questions.question: ______ you clean your room last night?
John ______ to the movies the next day.
questions.cn: 约翰第二天去看电影了。

questions.question: Why not ______ some water, Mary?
questions.cn: 玛丽,为什么不喝点水呢?

questions.question: They went to a store and ______ some things.
questions.cn: 他们去商店买了一些东西。

questions.question: Tom ______ Taiwan for America yesterday.
questions.cn: 汤姆昨天离开台湾去美国。

questions.question: Why not ______ by taxi, Mary?
questions.cn: 玛丽,为什么不坐的士去?

questions.question: Hard work brings ______.
questions.cn: 勤劳的工作才会带来成功。

questions.question: What ______ to him this morning?
questions.cn: 今天早上他出什么事了?

questions.question: When did the train from London ______?
questions.cn: 从伦敦来的火车是什么时候到达的?

questions.question: The ______ are a hardworking people.
questions.cn: 德国人民是一个勤劳的民族。

questions.question: Peter ______ the work in a week.
questions.cn: 彼得将在一星期后完成工作。

questions.question: Listen! Who ______ in the next room?
questions.cn: 听! 谁正在隔壁唱歌?

questions.question: I am very glad ______ that.
questions.cn: 我十分高兴听到那个消息。

questions.question: Look! The sun ______ in the east.
questions.cn: 看! 太阳正从东方升起。

questions.question: Latin is not a ______ language.
questions.cn: 拉丁语不是一种仍在使用的语言。

questions.question: I want to find a ______ job.
Mr. Wang's wife is an ______.
questions.cn: 王先生的夫人是美国人。

questions.question: My first class usually ______ at eight.
questions.cn: 我的第一节课通常八点钟开始。

questions.question: Tom's father is a bus ______.
questions.cn: 汤姆的父亲是公车司机。

questions.question: This book is ______ used in China.
questions.cn: 这本书在中国得到了广泛的使用。

questions.question: Joe and Jean are ______.
options: C. a brother and a sister

questions.question: Is there ______ English book on the desk?
questions.cn: 书桌上有一本英文书吗?

header: 英语语法基础练习题（九）

questions.question: He walks to the door and ______ it.
John and Tom ______ usually early to school.
questions.cn: 约翰和汤姆通常早到校。

questions.question: Why ______ he late this morning?
questions.cn: 他今天早晨为什么迟到了?

questions.question: ______ you cook breakfast this morning?
questions.cn: 你今天早晨做早餐了吗?

questions.question: ______ did Tom go to the zoo?
The ______ bought an apartment.
questions.cn: 黄家的人买了一间公寓。

questions.question: John watched TV, but you ______.
questions.cn: 约翰看电视了,但是你没有看。

questions.question: They ______ Taipei on January 26.
questions.cn: 他们在一月二十六日将离开台北。

questions.question: Lazy people do not use their time ______.
questions.cn: 懒散的人不会善用他们的时间。

questions.question: Do you remember the ______ days?
questions.cn: 你还记得那些让人厌烦的日子吗?

questions.question: She can speak English, and I ______, too.
It is a ______ food.
questions.cn: 它是一种有益健康的食品。

questions.question: He lives ______ near here.
questions.cn: 他住在这里附近的什么地方。

questions.question: This is a watch, ______ a clock.
You are a student, and I am, ______.
The boys and girls are playing ______.
questions.cn: 男孩子们和女孩子们正在那里玩。

questions.question: The class ______ English.
questions.cn: 这班级的学生正在读英语。

questions.question: There are ______ students in the classroom.
Miss Li teaches ______ at our school.
questions.cn: 李小姐在我们学校教音乐。

questions.question: Is your ______ class English?
questions.cn: 你的第二节课是英语吗?

questions.question: It is twenty ______ twelve in the evening.
questions.cn: 现在是晚上差二十分钟十二点。

questions.question: There are five ______ in his family.

header: 英语语法基础练习题（十）

questions.question: The Chinese ______ a good people.
questions.cn: 中华民族是一个优秀的民族。

questions.question: John is ______ only boy in his family.
questions.cn: 约翰是他家里唯一的男孩。

questions.question: Your story ______ interesting.
questions.cn: 你的故事听起来十分有趣。

questions.question: There ______ many apples on the table.
______ a beautiful flower this is!
questions.cn: 这是一朵多么漂亮的花呀!

questions.question: ______ is Jean's sister.
questions.cn: 那个漂亮的女孩是琴的妹妹。

questions.question: This is ______, not long.
questions.cn: 这是一枝很短的铅笔,不长。

questions.question: She ______ TV in the living room.
______ is my father's good friend.
questions.cn: 王医生是我爸爸的好朋友。

questions.question: I ______ a brother and two sisters.
questions.cn: 我有一个弟弟和两个妹妹。

questions.question: What is your ______ lesson?
questions.cn: 你的第二节课是什么课?

questions.question: He had lunch, but I ______.
questions.cn: 他吃过了午饭,可我还没有。

questions.question: I ______ a good dinner yesterday evening.
questions.cn: 昨天晚上我做了一顿不错的晚餐。

questions.question: ______ he have a picnic every week?
questions.cn: 每个星期他都去野餐吗?

questions.question: There ______ many trees and flowers there.
The ______ teacher is Mr. Wang.
questions.cn: 这些女孩的老师是王先生。

questions.question: The class ______ writing English.
questions.cn: 这班的学生正在写英语。

questions.question: Please do it ______ afternoon.
questions.cn: 请在今天下午做这件事。

header: 英语语法基础练习题（十一）

questions.question: My brother is a ______ boy.
questions.cn: 我弟弟是一个高个子男孩。

questions.question: There are sixty minutes in ______ hour.
Can I use ______ pen?
questions.cn: 我可以用一下你的笔吗?

questions.question: HTML is simple ______.
questions.cn: 超文字标记语言使用简单。

header: 英语语法基础练习题（十二）

questions.question: ______ I see your driver's license?
questions.cn: 我能看一下你的驾驶执照吗?

questions.question: I have no ______ for the bus.
______ decision's a great pity.
questions.cn: 他的决定非常令人遗憾。

questions.question: I'm afraid I ______ in the exam.
I haven't any ______ winter sport.
questions.cn: 我不喜欢任何冬季运动。

questions.question: The photo flatters ______.
questions.cn: 这张照片比她本人好看。

questions.question: We ______ wait for a fine day.
questions.cn: 我们只好等一个好天儿了。

questions.question: We have ______ whisky, sir.
questions.cn: 先生,我们有苏格兰威士忌。

header: 英语语法基础练习题（十三）

questions.question: I think ______ rain.
options: C. it has been gone to
D. it had been gone to

questions.question: It is a sentence, a ______!
questions.cn: 它是一种宣判,终身宣判!

questions.question: I believe I ______ manage.
questions.cn: 我相信我会设法办到的。

questions.question: My ______ website is Yahoo.
questions.cn: 我最喜欢的网站是雅虎。

questions.question: He is two years ______ than me.
I owe my success ______ colleagues' help.
questions.cn: 我的成功归功于同事的帮助。

questions.question: Why not find a ______ job?
questions.cn: 为什么不找一份兼职的工作呢?

questions.question: Let's ______ the forest this winter then.
questions.cn: 我们今年冬天就去森林吧。

header: 英语语法基础练习题（十四）

questions.question: I hope I ______ do it well.
